name: DelegateOwnershipManager
description: A delegate ownership manager to allow minting permissions to be set independent of ownership on the ABQ token.

eventDecorators.name: MintPermission
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when minting permission is set.

parameterDecorators.name: target
parameterDecorators.description: The address to set permission for.

eventDecorators.name: OwnerChange
eventDecorators.description: The event emitted if the owner is changed.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The new owner for this contract.

functionDecorators.name: changeName
functionDecorators.description: Change the name of the token. Only the owner may call this.

functionDecorators.name: changeSymbol
functionDecorators.description: Change the symbol of the token. Only the owner may call this.

functionDecorators.name: changeThisOwner
functionDecorators.description: Allows the owner to change the ownership to another address.

parameterDecorators.name: _newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address that should be the new owner.

functionDecorators.name: changeTokenOwner
functionDecorators.description: Change the owner of the token. Only the owner may call this.

parameterDecorators.name: _newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The new owner of the token.

functionDecorators.name: mint
functionDecorators.description: Mint tokens should the msg.sender has permission to mint.

parameterDecorators.name: _target
parameterDecorators.description: The address to mint tokens to.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens to mint.

functionDecorators.name: mintPermission
functionDecorators.description: The addresses that have mint permissions.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: The owner of the DelegateOwnershipManager. This should be the Aardbanq DAO.

functionDecorators.name: setMintPermission
functionDecorators.description: Set minting permission for a given address.

parameterDecorators.name: _target
parameterDecorators.description: The address to set minting permission for.

parameterDecorators.name: _mayMint
parameterDecorators.description: If set to true the _target address will be allowed to mint.
